trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been successfully read from the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: Som standard den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>händelsen inträffar inifrån den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden efter en sessionstoken (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) har lästs från sessions-cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: I händelse-hanteraren, du kan ändra egenskaperna för sessionstoken innan den skickas ytterligare längsmed pipelinen och används för att autentisera den entitet som gjort begäran (användare).

trans-unit.source: You can access the token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan komma åt token via den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: När du har ändrat token som du kan se till att de skrivs tillbaka till cookien genom att ange den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A>till `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event is a cancelable event, and you can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property (inherited from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>) to abort further processing of the request.
trans-unit.target: Slutligen den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>händelse är en cancelable händelse och du kan ange den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen (ärvt från <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>) att avbryta vidare bearbetning av begäran.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"></xref> class that has the specified session token.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"> </xref> klass som har angivna sessionstoken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `sessionToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>egenskap är inställd på den token som anges av den `sessionToken` parameter.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was received.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to reissue the session cookie with the response.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om du vill återutfärda sessions-cookie med svaret.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to reissue the session cookie with the response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att återutfärda sessions-cookie med svaret; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the session cookie is not reissued with the response.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, sessionen cookie inte återutfärdas med svaret.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the session security token that was received.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den session säkerhetstoken som togs emot.

trans-unit.source: The session token that was received.
